products.title: Oslo Blackout Solar Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Oslo Blackout Solar Yellow Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £7.70 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Our best-selling Oslo Blackout range comes in several colours and features a natural weave effect finish and colour-match blackout backing, perfect for adding style inside and outside your home! 
 
This bright sunny yellow roller blind brightens any room and is also made from blackout fabric, to help blackout the light when desired, making this quality made to measure roller blind a perfect addition to room that needs optimum light control.  Our roller are great for privacy and light control. 
 
At Swift Direct Blinds, we take quality seriously.  Not only are we situated in the heart of the Yorkshire textile industry, but our own company is also seeped with a rich history, with over 50 years experience making blinds and curtains for home up and down the country.  This yellow roller blind not only comes with a fabulous 5 year guarantee, for extra peace of mind, but is made by our blind specialists and comes with caring customer-first service.  Still not sure?  Why not check out our industry-leading SizeSure measuring-insurance, or if really in rush browse our SwiftTrack blinds, for delivery next day!
 
 Product ID: DB-PRBX0041 Fabric Colour: Solar Yellow Material: 100% Polyester Lining: Colour Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Smooth Continuous-Looped Chain Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Konya Blackout Primrose Yellow
products.metadescription: Made to Measure Konya Blackout Primrose Yellow Roller Blind | Privacy, Thermal Fabric | blindsbypost
products.productdescription: Konya Blackout Primrose Yellow Plain Roller Blind The Konya range boasts a huge range of blackout and thermal fabrics to use in any room.  The fabric is composed of 100% Polyester, with a PVC blackout backing and is rolled around a strong, rust free aluminium tube. The blind is supplied with a premium control mechanism with White chain used as standard, or a Nickel metal chain can be chosen above to upgrade. Supplied with the blinds are installation instructions and universal brackets suitable for top, side and face fixing. If   the width and the drop are greater than 1800mm, the fabric may be joined either by a stitch or weld dependant on our professional discretion.

products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow Roller Blind in Yellow. Made to measure from £13.13 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
The warm, golden hues of this roller blind will definitely catch the eye!  Boheme PVC Blackout Summer Yellow blind is the ideal way to add a splash of colour to your favourite room. With a fabulously modern geometrical leaf design outlined in white, it's a cheerful window dressing that will stand the test of time. Plus, it has double sided print that can be admired from outside too. This blind is made from blackout fabric to prevent unwanted light travelling into your room and its flame retardant for safety.

products.title: Bright Yellow (4570) (Blackout)

products.productdescription:
The Velux blackout blind offers light proof seal for total darkness anytime. It is ideal in bedrooms, where you need complete light control to ensure a good nights sleep or restful nap during the day.

 	Total blackout - best on the market.
 	Oeko-Tex certified.
 	Stepless positioning.
 	Slim design integrates perfectly with your roof window.
 	Available in 24 colours.
 	Installs in minutes.
